member.name: M:AdcsToRest.Controllers.GetCACertificateController.Get(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retrieves the certification authority certificate for a given certification authority.

member.name: M:AdcsToRest.Controllers.GetCACertificateController.Post(AdcsToRest.Models.GetCACertificateRequest)
member.summary: Retrieves the certification authority certificate for a given certification authority.

member.name: M:AdcsToRest.Controllers.SubmitController.Post(AdcsToRest.Models.SubmitRequest)
member.summary: Submits a certificate signing request (CSR) to a given certification authority.

member.name: M:AdcsToRest.Controllers.RetrievePendingController.Get(System.String,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retrieves an issued certificate from a given certification authority.

member.name: M:AdcsToRest.Controllers.RetrievePendingController.Post(AdcsToRest.Models.RetrievePendingRequest)
member.summary: Retrieves an issued certificate from a given certification authority.

member.name: P:AdcsToRest.Models.GetCACertificateRequest.CertificationAuthority
member.summary: The common name of the target certification authority.

member.name: P:AdcsToRest.Models.GetCACertificateRequest.IncludeCertificateChain
member.summary: When set to true, the response will be a PKCS#7 container including the certificate chain instead of a plain certificate.

member.name: P:AdcsToRest.Models.RetrievePendingRequest.CertificationAuthority
member.summary: The common name of the target certification authority.

member.name: P:AdcsToRest.Models.RetrievePendingRequest.IncludeCertificateChain
member.summary: When set to true, the response will be a PKCS#7 container including the certificate chain instead of a plain certificate.

member.name: P:AdcsToRest.Models.RetrievePendingRequest.RequestId
member.summary: The request ID of the certificate to retrieve.

member.name: P:AdcsToRest.Models.SubmitRequest.CertificationAuthority
member.summary: The common name of the target certification authority.

member.name: P:AdcsToRest.Models.SubmitRequest.IncludeCertificateChain
member.summary: When set to true, the response will be a PKCS#7 container including the certificate chain instead of a plain certificate.

member.name: P:AdcsToRest.Models.SubmitRequest.CertificateRequest
member.summary: The certificate request as BASE64 encoded DER (aka PEM) string. PKCS#10, PKCS#7/CMS and CMC are supported. See RequestType parameter.

member.name: P:AdcsToRest.Models.SubmitRequest.RequestType
member.summary: The type of the submitted certificate request constant as defined in CertCli.h. Possible Values: 0x100 (PKCS#10), 0x300 (PKCS#7), 0x400 (CMC). Defaults to PKCS#10.

member.name: P:AdcsToRest.Models.SubmitRequest.RequestAttributes
member.summary: Optional request attributes as a collection of strings. A request attribute is declared as a name-value pair separated by a colon. For example, to specify a certificate template name, you would add "CertificateTemplate:TemplateNameHere".

member.name: P:AdcsToRest.Models.IssuedCertificate.Description
member.summary: A textual description of the outcome of the submission process.

member.name: P:AdcsToRest.Models.IssuedCertificate.StatusCode
member.summary: Status code for the processing of incoming API requests and the connection to the certification authority, Contains HResult error codes as defined in WinErr.h.

member.name: P:AdcsToRest.Models.IssuedCertificate.StatusMessage
member.summary: A textual description of the HResult error code.

member.name: P:AdcsToRest.Models.IssuedCertificate.RequestId
member.summary: The request ID of the issued certificate, or the pending request.

member.name: P:AdcsToRest.Models.IssuedCertificate.DispositionCode
member.summary: The disposition code returned by the certification authority for the certificate request as defined in CertCli.h. Can be one of: 0 (Request did not complete), 1 (Request failed), 2 (Request denied), 3 (Certificate issued), 4 (Certificate issued separately), 5 (Request taken under submission).

member.name: P:AdcsToRest.Models.IssuedCertificate.DispositionMessage
member.summary: A textual description of the disposition status returned by the certification authority.

member.name: P:AdcsToRest.Models.IssuedCertificate.Certificate
member.summary: The issued certificate, if issued by the certification authority. Always returned as BASE64-encoded DER (also known as PEM).
